duties_responsibilities.duty: Process all wholesale funding and payment requests, investigate and resolve billing and contract issues, and respond to dealer inquiries.
Track, close, and report on audit performance, highlighting potential problems at dealerships and ensuring security perfection with respect to inter-creditor agreements and documentation.

Conduct collection activities and monitor dealer insurance policies, renewals, and documentation. Ensure timely renewal of dealer insurance policies, and perform dealer affiliated lease line audits through analysis of leasing businesses and associated documentation.
Prepare dealer loan documentation, ensure completion and execution of all documents, and reconcile any GL issues related to wholesale.
Support internal and new employee cross-training, have expertise in operational, audit, reporting, and testing within WFS, and comply with local regulatory requirements and internal regulations.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS in Business or related field preferred, with 3+ years of experience in wholesale, floor plan, or financial services related activities.
